title: AISAC
extract: n (Old Testament) the second patriarch; son of Abraham and Sarah who was offered by Abraham as a sacrifice to God; father of Jacob and Esau. Example of: patriarch. any of the early biblical characters regarded as fathers of the human race.
extract_html: n (Old Testament) the second patriarch; son of Abraham and Sarah who was offered by Abraham as a sacrifice to God; father of Jacob and Esau. Example of: patriarch. any of the early biblical characters regarded as fathers of the human race.
